name: Attack of the Giant Mutant Lizard
description: In this short 2.5D arcade/action game, control a giant mutant lizard to eat people, crush cars, and throw things. Spend points on upgrades and new abilities and try to survive an increasingly deadly hail of bullets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
